baseline_groups.claim_summary: Larger groups (80-90) coordinate worse than smaller groups (10), leading to more bank runs
baseline_groups.notes: Logit coef=0.507, p=0.010. Period 8, all treatments except 7. Positive = large groups withdraw more.

global_notes: Lab experiment on bank-run coordination. 511 subjects, 6 treatments varying group size, interest rate, and persistence. 69 specs. Effect strengthens over later periods. Placebo (training periods) shows no effect.
